mapper.select: SELECT srbd.budget_line_id, srbd.budget_dis_year, srbd.budget_dis_amount, srbd.budget_dis_gap, spl.* FROM sodr_po_line spl LEFT JOIN scux_rcwl_budget_distribution srbd ON srbd.po_header_id = spl.po_header_id AND srbd.po_line_id = spl.po_line_id WHERE srbd.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND spl.po_header_id = #{poHeaderId} ORDER BY srbd.budget_dis_year
